Detailed Description

Provides the hal information about power.

This provider provides information about the power & battery. The info is obtained from the Hal subsystem. The following properties are provided:

    Battery.OnBattery - is machine is running on battery power
    Battery.ChargePercentage - battery charge percentage
    Battery.LowBattery - is battery low?
    Battery.TimeUntilLow - time (in seconds) until battery is low
    Battery.TimeUntilFull - time (in seconds) until battery is full

Communication with Hal happens over DBus.

ContextD::HalProvider::HalProvider (  ) 

Member Function Documentation

void ContextD::HalProvider::onDevicePropertyModified (  )  [private, slot]

Called when a battery property changed. We recompute all our properties.

void ContextD::HalProvider::onFirstSubscriberAppeared (  )  [private, slot]

Called when the first subscriber for any of the keys appears.

We initialize the connection to Hal and pick the first battery to inspect. We keep this connection and listen for updates as long as there is an active subscriber.

void ContextD::HalProvider::onLastSubscriberDisappeared (  )  [private, slot]

Called when the last subscriber stops watching any of our properties.

We terminate the connection to Hal, stop watching for battery changes and free the resources.

void ContextD::HalProvider::updateProperties (  )  [private]

This fetches values of the relevant battery properties and recomputes the context info based on that.

It recomputes all data (all context properties).
